Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, today I was very excited of the new Shared Horizons update. But when I started to play, the new parts started to bug, also there are some new colors that were added to parts like fuel tanks that aren’t showing up... any suggestions?

I should mention that I am not a pro player 

I don’t have any mods installed but I have Making History and Breaking Ground DLC

I have ksp in Steam

I really need help

Howdy @mviard4. I have moved your question to the support subforum, though right now I suspect there's not much people can do except suggest that you wait for some bug fixes. Anyone who does have a thought, though, feel free to offer it.

Try verifying the files in Steam: right click KSP in Steam > Properties > local files tab > verify integrity. That might fix it, if not then copy your save games somewhere outside of Steam’s folder tree (like your desktop, for example) and then uninstall and reinstall the game.

What exactly isn’t working properly for you?

On 7/2/2020 at 7:12 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Try verifying the files in Steam: right click KSP in Steam > Properties > local files tab > verify integrity. That might fix it, if not then copy your save games somewhere outside of Steam’s folder tree (like your desktop, for example) and then uninstall and reinstall the game.

What exactly isn’t working properly for you?

Great tip but didn’t work

the fairings and the new color styles for fuel tanks and engines like  the “poodle“ engine are the ones that lag the most
